about_the_game:
This is a journey filled with challenges and excitement, where you will face monsters of various forms and defeat them through clever skill casting and strategic choices.

Game Features:

  • Combat Experience: This game focuses on combat, where you will encounter a variety of medium and large monsters. Whether it's close combat or ranged attacks, you need to respond flexibly to emerge victorious in this life-and-death struggle.
  • Innovative Skill Casting: We use basic shapes (such as triangles, squares, etc.) and body movements to implement skill casting. This unique way of operation will bring you unprecedented fun in the game.
  • Comprehensive Beginner's Guide: We have designed a comprehensive and detailed beginner's guide mechanism to ensure that you can quickly get started and deeply experience the fun of the game.
  • Semi-free Exploration: This is a semi-free game where you can choose your own path. Whether it's confronting powerful enemies or searching for hidden secrets, the decision is yours.
  • Focus Challenge: This game requires a certain level of focus. Only by maintaining high concentration can you survive in battles with monsters.

We look forward to your joining us on this adventure filled with challenges and fun!

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains frequent violence and a little gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 3Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Six Core 4Ghz+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 3070
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room.

short_description: Step into an exhilarating fantasy world adventure where you'll confront a series of spine-chilling monsters. In this astonishing VR game, you'll need to maintain unwavering focus, utilizing your unique and powerful skills to defeat these formidable adversaries one by one!
